item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

I decided to post February's Meetup even before we have January's. It might be easier for people who need more time to plan in advance.

I am pleased to announce another Boston Karaoke Meetup on February 12th 2011! It's at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub in Cambridge MA again. Courtside has an excellent selection of over 20,000 songs and many large screens for viewing lyrics. Whatever kind of music you enjoy, there will be something for you.

We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 7-9PM so please try to get there by 7PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

It is free for anyone who does not sing, so feel free to come and just listen.

Space is limited, please sign up as soon as possible.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - February 12, 2011
